channel.title: Wtf microsoft
channel.description:
ok well i signed into xbox today and when i looked i saw that i had 0 gamerscore and my gamer zone was changed to cheater, but my freinds see that i still have all my gamer score and my gamer zone says recreation. if you know what happend message me
EDIT: holy shit this is just a sceme to make more money off people. its been happening alot around the XBL appeal forum. they tell people that "You cant earn achievments on previously earned games." I wanna go punch microsoft....

item.title: Wtf microsoft
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“vexx1345, post:1, topic:378640”]EDIT:
holy shit this is just a sceme to make more money off people. its been happening alot around the XBL appeal forum. they tell people that “You cant earn achievments on previously earned games.” I wanna go punch microsoft…[/quote]
I don’t get it.

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf microsoft
item.dc:creator: @Vexx Vexx
item.description:
@Vexx wrote:

[quote=“whip of soulz, post:17, topic:378640”][quote author=vexx1345 link=topic=474504.msg3472348#msg3472348 date=1295387020]

If you didn’t do anything against the rules, appeal it. If you did break the rules, you kinda deserve it, don’t you think?

well ive appealed to it and theyt sent me automated messages on all of them, so i just contacted customer support waiting for a reply to that

Did you mod your gamerscore?

no, i dont even know how to do that, nor know if i even can.[quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=474504.msg3470591#msg3470591 date=1295271096]
Delete your profile except the items and then recover it
[/quote]
did that the second i saw it, did nothing.

[/quote]
Nice gamer score modding.[/quote]
what?

Read full topic

Did you mod your gamerscore?

no, i dont even know how to do that, nor know if i even can.[quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=474504.msg3470591#msg3470591 date=1295271096]

[/quote]
did that the second i saw it, did nothing.[/quote]
Nice gamer score modding.

Read full topic

item.description:

That’s y xbox sucks get ps3

If you think something like this makes an xbox better than a ps3, then your fucked in the brain lol.
[/quote]

no ps3 is just better this just 1 example[/quote]

Tell me others because microsoft don’t just erase stats for no reason.
